meanings.sent1: The delivery of the package was quick and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The pizza delivery arrived in less than 30 minutes.
meanings.sent3: The delivery of jokes by the comedian had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her delivery of the speech was so powerful that it moved everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The delivery of the news about the promotion brought a smile to her face.

meanings.definition: The manner or style in which something is delivered.
meanings.sent1: His delivery of the presentation was confident and engaging.
meanings.sent2: The delivery of the message was clear and concise.
meanings.sent3: The delivery of the song was so off-key that it made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her delivery of the news was like a gentle breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The delivery of the surprise party was executed perfectly, leaving him speechless.

meanings.sent1: The doctor assisted in the delivery of the baby.
meanings.sent2: The animal's delivery of the offspring was a natural process.
meanings.sent3: The delivery of the new life brought joy to the entire family.
meanings.sent4: Her delivery of the puppies was a beautiful sight to witness.
meanings.sent5: The delivery of the foal was a moment of celebration on the farm.
